main.name: Masoud Merzaye
main.description: I am a full-stack developer, i have rich experiance in front-end and back-end developing, i am also a UX/UI designer
main.bio: I'm a full-stack Developer and UI/UX Designer with 7 years of professional experience. I'm interested in all kinds of visual communication, but my major focus is on Web Developing and Designing, mobile & tablet interfaces. i do  love building user-friendly websites and web apps .
main.contactmessage: Are you looking for a Web-Developer, Designer , UI/UX Designer? Great? All you need is to share your Idea with me! Let's get in touch!
